data.meanings: to pile up one over the other, set in order.
data.sentence: The word مَنْضُودٍ comes from the root ن ض د and is associated with the meanings: to pile up one over the other, set in order.
The word وَطَلْحٍ comes from the root ط ل ح and is associated with the meanings: acacias, plantains, banana trees
